page.title: 05THE FAMILY LIFE OF CHILDREN
page.content:
On Sunday afternoons my family and I go to Manor Gardens.There are squirrels there and we take nuts to feed them. Rebecca Thomas.
My family go to the Beachy Head Pub on Saturdays.I play pool and darts with Danny. Chay Kelly. On Sundays our family goes out for lunch in a pub or hotel,we usually eat beef or lamb.Afterwards I go and explore. Roberta Cramp. At the weekend my family goes to the sailing club. We have a boat called a Miracle.My sister and I also play on the beach. Sarah Hawgood.
